org.eclipse.jetty.websocket

Interface WebSocket.OnFrame

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WebSocket
    Enclosing interface:
    WebSocket

    public static interface WebSocket.OnFrame
extends WebSocket
    A nested WebSocket interface for receiving any websocket frame

      • onFrame

        boolean onFrame(byte flags,
              byte opcode,
              byte[] data,
              int offset,
              int length)
        Called when any websocket frame is received.
        Parameters:
        flags -
        opcode -
        data -
        offset -
        length -
        Returns:
        true if this call has completely handled the frame and no further processing is needed (including aggregation and/or message delivery)
